subject: p16313531
Findings: Stable widening of cardiomediastinal contours with persistent silhouetting of left heart border due to a large left pleural effusion with adjacent atelectasis and/or consolidation in the left mid and lower lung region. On the right, there is apparent elevation of the right hemidiaphragm with lateral peaking suggesting the presence of a subpulmonic pleural effusion. Areas of adjacent atelectasis in the right mid and lower lung have slightly improved.
Impression: Large left pleural effusion with adjacent atelectasis and/or consolidation. Possible subpulmonic component of right pleural effusion.
